alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Leake, southeastern Holmes, northeastern Rankin, southwestern Attala, northwestern Scott, northeastern Yazoo and Madison Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 300 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Coxburg to Pocahontas. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ebenezer around 310 AM CDT. Canton, Pickens and Gluckstadt around 315 AM CDT. Goodman around 320 AM CDT. Goshen Springs around 325 AM CDT. Durant, Newport, Sharon and Pisgah around 330 AM CDT. Farmhaven around 335 AM CDT. Mcadams around 340 AM CDT. Kosciusko and Ludlow around 345 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Sallis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Holmes; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Yazoo
